{"id":782974656,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1661423129,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/782974656/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Integer","memory":"5.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int reverse(int x) {\n        long long int y=0;int res=1;\n        if(x<0)res=-1;\n        x=abs(x);\n        while(x>0){\n            int rem=x%10;\n            y=10*y+rem;\n            x/=10;\n        } y=y*res;\n        if(y<((-1)*pow(2,31))||y>pow(2,31)-1)return 0;\n        return y;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-integer","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
